title: Report: Huawei and LG to build two Google Nexus devices this year | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexus 5]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * This signals a growing trend in the mobile industry to stave off dependence onQualcomm wares.Samsung is already expected to show off its own Exynos chipset inside thesoon-to-be-released [Galaxy S6 and S6Edge](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price).**Related:** [12 Best Android Phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)The last round of Nexus devices, namely the [Nexus 6smartphone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review) and the [Nexus 9tablet](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-9-review), were ill-receivedcompared to previous Google offerings.Google will likely go to great effort to ensure a better reception for thisyear’s Nexus line-up.
